useCase.name: Change Marketing Campaign
useCase.description: Allow the user to modify the marketing campaign

mainSequence.step: User initiates a request to change the marketing campaign
UMP sends a message to Retail UMP
Retail UMP processes the type of marketing campaign change, which can include adding, invalidating, deleting, or editing
Retail UMP synchronously or asynchronously sends a message to C
C processes the message and returns a response
Retail UMP returns a response to UMP
UMP returns a response to the User
